attributes.action: The immediate and unconditional resignation of David Cameron and George Osborne.
attributes.background: The British Prime Minister, David Cameron, and his Chancellor, George Osborne, have intentionally mislead the British public in relation to the United Kingdom's membership of the European Union and have habitually demonstrated their incompetence in defending UK interests at home and overseas.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister and the Chancellor, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. It is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.
